attributes.action: postpone the reparations to Iraqi families made by the MoD, due to so called mistreatment by British service personnel, until a formal apology is received from the Japanese Goverment in regards to the unacceptable mistreatment of British and all other Allied prisoners of war during the Second World War
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Goverment have betrayed the people of this country for far too long.
